      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)

      • resetPlayer

        public static void resetPlayer(CheckerStatus status)
        Reset the role of the players according to the chess color of the human player. Player, either the human or the computer, holding BLACK chesses goes first.
        Parameters:
        status - the checker status representing human, either BLACK or WHITE.

      • humanChooseChecker

        public static void humanChooseChecker(Location cell,
                      CheckerStatus status)
        Handle a checkSelected event.
        Parameters:
        cell - the location of the selected checker.

      • getCurrentPlayer

        public static Player getCurrentPlayer()
        Return the player who gets the turn, either the human or the computer.
        Returns:
        the player who gets the turn.

      • isGameover

        public static boolean isGameover()
        Return true if the either the human or the computer wins the game or it reaches an even case, false otherwise.
        Returns:
        true if the either the human or the computer wins the game or it reaches an even case, false otherwise.

      • getCurrentState

        public static CBStatus getCurrentState()
        Return the player who gets the turn, either the human or the computer.
        Returns:
        the player who gets the turn.

      • showMove

        public static void showMove(Action path)
        Show how a move is taken in the game window.
        Parameters:
        path - the path along which the move to be shown is taken.

      • updateState

        public static void updateState()
        Update the game state and test if it reaches the end of the game. If yes, congrats to the winner. Otherwise, change turn to next player.
